name: HDX Ratchet Pro 40-Piece Screwdriver Set
description: HDX 40-piece ratcheting screwdriver set is ideal for working on all kinds of screws. The various bits save you money to buy many screwdrivers. Ratcheting handle makes work easy and efficient. New design HDX handle is durable and comfortable.Set includes: 1-piece ratcheting screwdriver, 39-piece bits: SL1/8, SL5/32, SL3/16 x 3-piece SL1/4 x 3-piece P0 x 2-piece P1 x 4-piece P2 x 4-piece P3 x 2-piece S0, S1 x 2-piece S2 x 4-piece S3, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, T40, H1/8, H5/32, H3/16, H1/4, 1 plastic caseDual material cushion gripHDX new designDurable and easy for use

attributes.value: 1-piece ratcheting screwdriver, 39-piece bits: SL1/8, SL5/32, SL3/16 x 3-piece SL1/4 x 3-piece P0 x 2-piece P1 x 4-piece P2 x 4-piece P3 x 2-piece S0, S1 x 2-piece S2 x 4-piece S3, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, T40, H1/8, H5/32, H3/16, H1/4, 1 plastic case
